pc.title: Cyberpunk 2077
pc.description: An open-world action RPG set in the dystopian Night City, where players assume the role of V, a mercenary in search of a one-of-a-kind implant.

pc.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
pc.description: A narrative-driven, open-world RPG where players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter on a quest to find his adopted daughter.

pc.title: Doom Eternal
pc.description: A fast-paced, first-person shooter where players battle demonic forces as the Doom Slayer.

pc.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
pc.description: An open-world Western epic that follows outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang as they try to survive in 1899 America.

pc.title: Hades
pc.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where players control Zagreus, the son of Hades, as he attempts to escape the Underworld.

pc.title: Half-Life: Alyx
pc.description: A virtual reality FPS set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2, where players control Alyx Vance in a fight against an alien force.

pc.title: Control
pc.description: A supernatural third-person shooter where players explore the mysterious Federal Bureau of Control and its shifting architecture.

pc.title: Stardew Valley
pc.description: A farming simulation RPG where players can grow crops, raise animals, and build relationships with townsfolk.

pc.title: Among Us
pc.description: A multiplayer party game where players work together to complete tasks on a spaceship while impostors try to sabotage their efforts.

pc.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
pc.description: A visually stunning platformer that follows the adventures of Ori, a small guardian spirit, in a vibrant, hand-painted world.

Ps.title: The Last of Us Part II
Ps.description: An emotionally charged action-adventure game that follows Ellieâ€™s journey through a post-apocalyptic world filled with danger and moral ambiguity.

Ps.title: Ghost of Tsushima
Ps.description: An open-world action-adventure game set in feudal Japan, where players assume the role of a samurai fighting to protect his homeland from Mongol invasion.

Ps.title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
Ps.description: An action-packed game that follows Miles Morales as the new Spider-Man, battling new threats and learning to harness his unique abilities.

Ps.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake
Ps.description: A reimagining of the classic RPG that follows Cloud Strife and his allies as they fight against the corrupt Shinra Corporation and the enigmatic Sephiroth.

Ps.title: Horizon Zero Dawn
Ps.description: An open-world RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world where players control Aloy, a hunter battling robotic creatures in a lush, futuristic landscape.

Ps.title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
Ps.description: A platformer that follows Ratchet and Clank as they travel through different dimensions to stop an evil emperor from conquering the multiverse.

Ps.title: Death Stranding
Ps.description: An action game set in a post-apocalyptic world where players control Sam Porter Bridges, a delivery man tasked with reconnecting isolated communities.

Ps.title: Demon's Souls
Ps.description: A remake of the classic action RPG where players explore a dark, challenging world filled with monstrous enemies and epic bosses.

Ps.title: Gran Turismo 7
Ps.description: The latest entry in the Gran Turismo series, featuring realistic racing mechanics, a wide variety of cars, and detailed tracks.

Ps.title: Persona 5 Royal
Ps.description: An enhanced version of the critically acclaimed JRPG Persona 5, featuring new characters, story elements, and gameplay improvements.

Xbox.title: Halo Infinite
Xbox.description: The latest installment in the Halo series, featuring Master Chief as he battles a new threat on the Halo ringworld, Zeta Halo.

Xbox.title: Forza Horizon 5
Xbox.description: An open-world racing game set in a vibrant recreation of Mexico, featuring a wide range of cars and diverse environments.

Xbox.title: Gears 5
Xbox.description: The fifth main entry in the Gears of War series, following Kait Diaz as she uncovers the truth about her family and the Swarm threat.

Xbox.title: Fable
Xbox.description: A reboot of the beloved Fable series, promising a rich, fantasy world with humor, choice-driven gameplay, and an expansive open world.

Xbox.title: Sea of Thieves
Xbox.description: A multiplayer pirate adventure game where players explore an open world, search for treasure, and engage in ship battles.

Xbox.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator
Xbox.description: A highly realistic flight simulator that allows players to pilot aircraft around the globe with stunning graphics and detailed environments.

Xbox.title: Elden Ring
Xbox.description: An action RPG from the creators of Dark Souls, featuring a vast open world, deep lore, and challenging combat, set in a world co-created by George R.R. Martin.

Xbox.title: Dying Light 2
Xbox.description: An open-world zombie survival game where players navigate a vast city, make choices that impact the story, and fight off the infected.

Xbox.title: Outriders
Xbox.description: A cooperative RPG shooter where players explore a hostile alien planet, battle powerful enemies, and uncover the mystery behind an anomaly.

Xbox.title: The Medium
Xbox.description: A psychological horror game featuring dual-reality gameplay, where players control a medium who can explore both the real world and the spirit world.
